page.title: 14Places of Worship
page.content: The area has 5 churches and 1 group which meets in a house. All are Christian. There has been a Methodist church since 1810. This building opened in 1837. The minister looks after 2 other churches. The U.R.C. is in its centenary year. it is looked after by a lady who is training for the ministry. The C.of E.parish church of St.Paul opened in 1861, the vicar also looks after Ashworth church. The Catholic church of St.Vincent de Paul opened in 1974. Holland Farm Fellowship has a lay reader for 24 adults and children. The Catholic church has a congregation of 1,200, Methodist 123, U.R.C. 76, Baptist 42. One minister spoke of co-operation between the churches. Activities are held in all the churches - fellowship, scouts, guides, karate, play groups, old folks' meetings and dances.
